mailing-address.narrative: 01 B.P. 2289 Recette Principale Cotonou Republic of Benin

sector.narrative: Capacity development of ECD frontline workers
Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)
Education sector planning including coordinating role, SDG 4, etc.
Other activities for equitable access to quality education e.g. school feeding, school grants
Provision of (formal and non-formal) early-learning / pre-primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of early learning / pre-primary education teacher training
Provision or procurement of early-learning / pre-primary education learning materials
Provision or procurement of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) learning materials
System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary teaching and learning environment (including curriculum and material design)
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: D’ici à fin 2018, le système éducatif au niveau central et les structures déconcentrées et décentralisées de 09 communes à faibles taux d’accès et d’achèvement et un quartier péri-urbain de Cotonou, ont des capacités accrues pour offrir aux jeunes enfants de 03 à 05 ans un encadrement de qualité les préparant à l’école.

description.narrative: Soixante-dix-huit (78) espaces enfance soutenus par le programme ont encadrX 3.924 enfants. Les acteurs formXs dans ces centres communautaires fourniront un appui X la gXnXralisation du prXscolaire communautaire comme prXvu dans le Plan Sectoriel de l'Education 2018-2030. | Status:Met | As-of Date:22/01/2019
